description: The Austrian capital had four decades of relative peace before a gunman's rampage.
title: Vienna shooting: The night my safe city lost its innocence
title_page: Vienna shooting: The night my safe city lost its innocence - BBC News
maintext: But at night, when its many bars and clubs open, it transforms into one of Vienna's most popular party zones. "It's called the Bermuda Triangle because you can get lost for days here, drinking and dancing," a friend told me when I first arrived here.
